#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int a, b, c, temp, prev;
    while(scanf("%d%d",&a,&b))
    {   c=0, prev=0;
        if(a==0&&b==0)
            return 0;

        else
        {
           if(a<b)
           {
               temp=a;
               a=b;
               b=temp;
           }
           while(a!=0)
           {
              if((a%10+b%10+prev)>9)
              {
                  c++;
                  a=a/10;
                  b=b/10;
                  prev=1;

              }
              else
              {
                  a=a/10;
                  b=b/10;
                  prev=0;

              }

           }

        }
        if(c==1)
        {
           printf("\n%d carry operation.\n",c);
        }
        else if(c>1)
        {
           printf("\n%d carry operations.\n",c);
        }
        else
          {
           printf("\nNo carry operation.\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
